segments.text: Do you need help with something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to make a transfer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What account would you like to transfer the money from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to transfer money from my savings account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do you want the money to go to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want the money to be transferred into my checking account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much money are you going to transfer today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that all I can do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I won â€™ t be needing anything else .
segments.speaker: S2
